titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the reliefe and maintenance of sicke and maimed souldiers, and of poor widowes & children of souldiers slain in the service of the Parliament : with the several summes of money which is to be rated and leavyed for the purpose, upon the severall counties herein mentioned.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
